title: Two Sum (Indices)
statement: Given an array of integers and a target, return the indices of two numbers that add up to target (0-based). Assume exactly one solution.
explain: You can sort with two pointers or use a HashMap for O(n). For now, enter the resulting indices as [i,j].

title: Reverse String
statement: Given a string s, return the reversed string.
explain: Use two pointers from ends or StringBuilder reverse.

title: Valid Parentheses
statement: Given a string containing '()[]{}', determine if the input string is valid.
explain: Use a stack; push opens, match on close.
